trans-unit.source: The following methods are used to create and use audioplayer objects. These objects can be used to play back audio data stored in Octave matrices and arrays. trans-unit.source: The fourth output is a structure output containing runtime about the algorithm. Fields in the structure are funcCount containing the number of function calls to fun, iterations containing the number of iteration steps, algorithm with the name of the search algorithm (always: "Nelder-Mead simplex direct search"), and message with the exit message.
trans-unit.target: 第四个输出是包含有关算法的运行时的结构 output 。在结构领域的 funcCount 包含函数调用次数 fun ， iterations 包含的迭代步数， algorithm 与搜索算法的名称（总是： "Nelder-Mead simplex direct search" ），以及 message 与退出消息。

trans-unit.source: The frequencies from [2*pi*a/t, 2*pi*b/T] are used for the estimation. If b is omitted, the interval [2*pi/T, 2*pi*a/T] is used. If both b and a are omitted then a = 0.5 * sqrt (T) and b = 1.5 * sqrt (T) is used, where T is the sample size. If x is a matrix, the differencing parameter of each column is estimated.
trans-unit.target: 来自[2 * pi * a / t，2 * pi * b / T]的频率用于估计。如果省略 b ，则使用间隔[2 * pi / T，2 * pi * a / T]。如果同时省略 b 和 a ，则使用a = 0.5 * sqrt（T）和b = 1.5 * sqrt（T），其中T是样本大小。如果 x 是矩阵，则估计每列的差异参数。

trans-unit.source: The function max_recursion_depth may be used to specify a limit to the recursion depth and prevents Octave from recursing infinitely. Similarly, the function max_stack_depth may be used to specify limit to the depth of function calls, whether recursive or not. These limits help prevent stack overflow on the computer Octave is running on, so that instead of exiting with a signal, the interpreter will throw an error and return to the command prompt.

trans-unit.source: The function being debugged may be the leaf node of a series of function calls. After examining values in the current subroutine it may turn out that the problem occurred in earlier pieces of code. Use dbup and dbdown to move up and down through the series of function calls to locate where variables first took on the wrong values. dbstack shows the entire series of function calls and at what level debugging is currently taking place.
trans-unit.target: 被调试的函数可能是一系列函数调用的叶节点。在检查了当前子例程中的值之后，可能会发现问题出在早期的代码段中。使用 dbup 和 dbdown 在一系列函数调用中上下移动，以查找变量首次采用错误值的位置。 dbstack 显示了整个函数调用系列，以及当前正在进行的调试级别。

trans-unit.source: The function call airy (z) is equivalent to airy (0, z).

trans-unit.source: The function call graphics_toolkit ("qt") selects the Qt/OpenGL system, graphics_toolkit ("fltk") selects the FLTK/OpenGL system, and graphics_toolkit ("gnuplot") selects the gnuplot system. The three systems may be used selectively through the use of the graphics_toolkit property of the graphics handle for each figure. This is explained in Graphics Data Structures.

The function call graphics_toolkit ("qt") selects the Qt/OpenGL system, graphics_toolkit ("fltk") selects the FLTK/OpenGL system, and graphics_toolkit ("gnuplot") selects the gnuplot system. The three systems may be used selectively through the use of the graphics_toolkit property of the graphics handle for each figure. This is explained in Graphics Data Structures. Caution: The OpenGL-based toolkits use single precision variables internally which limits the maximum value that can be displayed to approximately 10^{38}. If your data contains larger values you must use the gnuplot toolkit which supports values up to 10^{308}.
trans-unit.target: 函数调用 graphics_toolkit ("qt") 选择Qt / OpenGL系统， graphics_toolkit ("fltk") 选择FLTK / OpenGL系统， graphics_toolkit ("gnuplot") 选择gnuplot系统。通过使用每个 graphics_toolkit 的图形句柄的graphics_toolkit属性，可以有选择地使用这三个系统。这在“ 图形数据结构”中进行了说明。注意：基于OpenGL的工具包在内部使用单精度变量，该变量将可显示的最大值限制为大约10 ^ {38}。如果数据包含较大的值，则必须使用gnuplot工具箱，该工具箱最多支持10 ^ {308}的值。

trans-unit.source: The fundamental idea (Pareto principle) behind the use of Pareto diagrams is that the majority of an effect is due to a small subset of the causes. For quality improvement, the first few contributing causes (leftmost bars as presented on the diagram) to a problem usually account for the majority of the result. Thus, targeting these "major causes" for elimination results in the most cost-effective improvement scheme.
trans-unit.target: 使用帕累托图背后的基本思想(帕累托原则)是,一个效果的大部分是由一小部分原因造成的。对于质量改进来说,导致问题的前几个原因(图上最左边的柱子)通常占了结果的大部分。因此,针对这些 "主要原因 "进行消除,可以获得最具成本效益的改进方案。

trans-unit.source: The graphics functions use pointers, which are of class graphics_handle, in order to address the data structures which control visual display. A graphics handle may point to any one of a number of different base object types and these objects are the graphics data structures themselves. The primitive graphic object types are: figure, axes, line, text, patch, surface, text, image, and light.
trans-unit.target: 图形函数使用属于graphics_handle类的指针，以解决控制视觉显示的数据结构。图形句柄可以指向许多不同基础对象类型中的任何一种，并且这些对象本身就是图形数据结构。原始图形对象的类型有： figure ， axes ， line ， text ， patch ， surface ， text ， image ，和 light 。

trans-unit.source: The help command can provide information about most operators, but name must be enclosed by single or double quotes to prevent the Octave interpreter from acting on name. For example, help "+" displays help on the addition operator.
trans-unit.target: help命令可以提供有关大多数运算符的信息，但是 name 必须用单引号或双引号引起来，以防止Octave解释器对 name 起作用。例如， help "+" 在加法运算符上显示帮助。

trans-unit.source: The help message may have multiple lines separated by newline characters ("\n"), or it may be a cellstr array with one element for each line.
trans-unit.target: 帮助信息可以有多行,用换行符("\n")隔开,也可以是一个单元格数组,每行一个元素。

trans-unit.source: The hull <var>H</var> is a linear index vector into the original set of points that specifies which points form the enclosing hull. For 2-D inputs only, the output is ordered in a counterclockwise manner around the hull.
trans-unit.target: 船体 <var>H</var> 是原始点集的线性索引向量，它指定哪些点形成封闭的船体。仅对于2D输入，输出以围绕船体的逆时针方向排序。

trans-unit.source: The hull <var>h</var> is an index vector into the set of points and specifies which points form the enclosing hull.

trans-unit.source: The i-th row of coefs, coefs(i,:), contains the coefficients for the polynomial over the i-th interval, ordered from highest (m) to lowest (0) degree.

trans-unit.source: The image img can be a binary, grayscale, RGB, or multi-dimensional image. The size and class of img should be the same as what should be expected when reading it with imread: the 3rd and 4th dimensions reserved for color space, and multiple pages respectively. If it’s an indexed image, the colormap map must also be specified.
trans-unit.target: 图像 img 可以是二进制，灰度，RGB或多维图像。 img 的大小和类别应与使用 imread 读取时应预期的大小相同：分别为颜色空间保留的第3和第4维度，以及分别为多个页面。如果它是索引图像，则还必须指定颜色 map 。

trans-unit.source: The image <var>x</var> must be an indexed image which will be converted using the colormap <var>map</var>. If <var>map</var> does not contain enough colors for the image, pixels in <var>x</var> outside the range are mapped to the last color in the map before conversion to grayscale.
trans-unit.target: 图像 <var>x</var> 必须是索引图像，该图像将使用颜色 <var>map</var> 进行转换。如果 <var>map</var> 的图像颜色不足，则在转换为灰度之前， <var>x</var> 超出范围的像素将映射到地图中的最后一种颜色。

trans-unit.source: The image <var>x</var> must be an indexed image which will be converted using the colormap <var>map</var>. If <var>map</var> does not contain enough colors for the image, pixels in <var>x</var> outside the range are mapped to the last color in the map.

trans-unit.source: The index of the subplot to make active may also be specified by its axes handle, hax, returned from a previous subplot command.

trans-unit.source: The indexed image will consist of <var>n</var> different intensity values. If not given <var>n</var> defaults to 64 for grayscale images or 2 for binary black and white images.
trans-unit.target: 索引图像将包含 <var>n</var> 个不同的强度值。如果未指定，则对于灰度图像， <var>n</var> 默认为64；对于二进制黑白图像，n默认为2。

trans-unit.source: The indexing arguments may be scalar (2), arrays ([1, 3]), ranges (1:3), or the colon operator (":"). However, the indexing keyword end is not available.
trans-unit.target: 索引参数可以是标量（ 2 ），数组（ [1, 3] ），范围（ 1:3 ）或冒号运算符（ ":" ）。但是，索引关键字 end 不可用。

trans-unit.source: The indexing operations operate on the cell array and not on the objects within the cell array. By contrast, cellindexmat applies matrix indexing to the objects within each cell array entry and returns the requested values.
trans-unit.target: 索引操作在单元阵列上而不是在单元阵列内的对象上进行。相反， cellindexmat 将矩阵索引应用于每个单元格数组条目内的对象，并返回请求的值。

trans-unit.target: 索引运算符也可以用来插入或覆盖单元格数组的元素。下面的代码在之前创建的单元格数组的第三位插入标量3。

trans-unit.source: The indices in <var>sel</var> are 1-based.
trans-unit.target: <var>sel</var> 中的索引基于1。

trans-unit.source: The information returned for the "-blas" and "-lapack" options might be unreliable. It might report which library was linked in when Octave was built instead of which library is currently used.

The initial matrix x0 should have columns of unit 1-norm. The default initial matrix x0 has the first column ones (n, 1) / n and, if t > 1, the remaining columns with random elements -1 / n, 1 / n, divided by n.
trans-unit.target: 初始矩阵 x0 应具有单位1-范数的列。默认的初始矩阵 x0 的第一 ones (n, 1) / n ，如果 t > 1，则其余列的随机元素为 -1 / n ， 1 / n ，然后除以 n 。

trans-unit.target: 的初始值来自环境变量 OCTAVE_EXEC_PATH ，但该值可以由命令行参数覆盖

trans-unit.source: The input <var>a</var> must be a square numeric matrix.
trans-unit.target: 输入 <var>a</var> 必须是平方数字矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The input c determines the color of the polygon. The simplest form is a single color specification such as a plot format or an RGB-triple. In this case the polygon(s) will have one unique color. If c is a vector or matrix then the color data is first scaled using caxis and then indexed into the current colormap. A row vector will color each polygon (a column from matrices x and y) with a single computed color. A matrix c of the same size as x and y will compute the color of each vertex and then interpolate the face color between the vertices.
trans-unit.target: 输入 c 确定多边形的颜色。最简单的形式是单一颜色规范，例如 plot 格式或RGB三重。在这种情况下，多边形将具有一种唯一的颜色。如果 c 是向量或矩阵，则首先使用 caxis 缩放颜色数据，然后将其索引到当前的颜色图中。行向量将使用单个计算出的颜色为每个多边形（矩阵 x 和 y 的一列）着色。与 x 和 y 大小相同的矩阵 c 将计算每个顶点的颜色，然后在顶点之间插入面部颜色。

trans-unit.source: The input data is the structure returned by profile ("info"). If unspecified, profexport will use the current profile dataset.
trans-unit.target: 输入 data 是 profile ("info") 返回的结构。如果未指定，则 profexport 将使用当前配置文件数据集。

trans-unit.source: The input data is the structure returned by profile ("info"). If unspecified, profshow will use the current profile dataset.
trans-unit.target: 输入 data 是 profile ("info") 返回的结构。如果未指定，则 profshow 将使用当前配置文件数据集。

trans-unit.source: The input <var>deg</var> must be a scalar, vector, or N-dimensional array of double or single floating point values. <var>deg</var> may be complex in which case the real and imaginary components are converted separately.
trans-unit.target: 输入 <var>deg</var> 必须是双或单个浮点值的标量，向量或N维数组。 <var>deg</var> 可能很复杂，在这种情况下，实部和虚部分别进行转换。

trans-unit.source: The input dims is a dimension vector where each element is the size of the array in the respective dimension (see size). The remaining inputs are scalars or vectors of subscripts to be converted.
trans-unit.target: 输入的 dims 是一个维数向量，其中每个元素都是相应维数中数组的大小（请参见size）。其余输入是要转换的下标的标量或向量。

trans-unit.source: The input dims is a dimension vector where each element is the size of the array in the respective dimension (see size). The second input ind contains linear indies to be converted.
trans-unit.target: 输入的 dims 是一个维数向量，其中每个元素都是相应维数中数组的大小（请参见size）。第二个输入 ind 包含要转换的线性indie。

trans-unit.source: The input <var>filename</var> is a string which is parsed. There is no attempt to check whether the filename or directory specified actually exists.
trans-unit.target: 输入的 <var>filename</var> 是一个已解析的字符串。没有尝试检查指定的文件名或目录是否实际存在。

trans-unit.source: The input <var>h</var> is a vector of graphic handles to link.
trans-unit.target: 输入 <var>h</var> 是要链接的图形句柄的向量。

trans-unit.source: The input <var>h</var> may also be a vector of graphic handles in which case each individual object will be reset.
trans-unit.target: 输入 <var>h</var> 也可以是图形手柄的矢量，在这种情况下，每个单独的对象都将被重置。

trans-unit.source: The input <var>isoval</var> is a scalar that specifies the value for the isosurface. If <var>isoval</var> is omitted or empty, a "good" value for an isosurface is determined from <var>v</var>.
trans-unit.target: 输入 <var>isoval</var> 是指定等值面值的标量。如果 <var>isoval</var> 省略或空，等值面“好”的值由下式确定 <var>v</var> 。

trans-unit.source: The input <var>j</var> is an integer index in the range [0, 2^32-1]. The values of the output matrix are always exactly the same (reproducibility) for a given size input and <var>j</var> index.
trans-unit.target: 输入 <var>j</var> 是[0，2 ^ 32-1]范围内的整数索引。对于给定的大小输入和 <var>j</var> 索引，输出矩阵的值始终完全相同（可重复性）。

trans-unit.source: The input <var>m</var> is either a 3 or 4 column real matrix, containing the row, column, real, and imaginary parts of the elements of the sparse matrix. An element with a zero real and imaginary part can be used to force a particular matrix size.
trans-unit.target: 输入 <var>m</var> 是3列或4列实数矩阵，包含稀疏矩阵元素的行，列，实数和虚数部分。实部和虚部为零的元素可用于强制特定的矩阵大小。

trans-unit.source: The input <var>rad</var> must be a scalar, vector, or N-dimensional array of double or single floating point values. <var>rad</var> may be complex in which case the real and imaginary components are converted separately.
trans-unit.target: 输入 <var>rad</var> 必须是双或单个浮点值的标量，向量或N维数组。 <var>rad</var> 可能很复杂，在这种情况下，实部和虚部分别进行转换。

trans-unit.source: The input <var>str</var> must be a string or a cell array of strings. The output <var>uniqstr</var> will be of the same type.
trans-unit.target: 输入 <var>str</var> 必须是字符串或字符串的单元格数组。输出 <var>uniqstr</var> 将具有相同的类型。

trans-unit.source: The input <var>str</var> must be a string or a cell array of strings. The output <var>varname</var> will be of the same type.
trans-unit.target: 输入 <var>str</var> 必须是字符串或字符串的单元格数组。输出 <var>varname</var> 名将具有相同的类型。

trans-unit.source: The input t must be a column vector of length 2 with the first and last time step ([tfirst tlast]. The input y contains the initial conditions for the ode problem (y0).
trans-unit.target: 输入 t 必须是长度为2的列向量，且具有第一个和最后一个时间步长（ [tfirst tlast] 。输入 y 包含颂歌问题的初始条件（ y0 ）。

trans-unit.source: The input <var>t</var> must be a scalar double specifying the time for which the solution in input <var>y</var> was calculated.
trans-unit.target: 输入 <var>t</var> 必须是标量双精度，指定输入 <var>y</var> 中的解的计算时间。

trans-unit.source: The input theta is assumed to be radians and is converted to degrees for plotting. If you have degrees then you must convert (see cart2pol) to radians before passing the data to this function.
The input <var>x</var> may also be a matrix with two or three columns where the first column contains x-data, the second y-data, and the optional third column contains z-data.
trans-unit.target: 输入 <var>x</var> 也可以是具有两列或三列的矩阵，其中第一列包含x数据，第二列y数据，可选的第三列包含z数据。

trans-unit.source: The input <var>x</var> must be a numeric scalar, vector, or array.
trans-unit.target: 输入 <var>x</var> 必须是数字标量，向量或数组。

trans-unit.source: The input x should be a vector of integers. Any non-integer values will be converted to integer by x = fix (x). By default each element of x will be plotted with the last digit of the element as a leaf value and the remaining digits as the stem. For example, 123 will be plotted with the stem ‘

trans-unit.source: The input can be both a colormap or RGB image. In the case of floating point input, values are expected to be on the [0 1] range. In the case of hue (azimuth), since the value corresponds to an angle, mod (h, 1) is used.
trans-unit.target: 输入可以是彩色图或RGB图像。在浮点输入的情况下，值应在[0 1]范围内。在色相（方位角）的情况下，由于该值对应于角度，因此使用 mod (h, 1) 。

trans-unit.source: The input image <var>rgb</var> can be specified as a single matrix of size MxNx3, or as three separate variables, <var>R</var>, <var>G</var>, and <var>B</var>, its three color channels, red, green, and blue.
trans-unit.target: 输入图像 <var>rgb</var> 可以指定为大小为MxNx3的单个矩阵，也可以指定为三个单独的变量 <var>R</var> ， <var>G</var> 和 <var>B</var> ，其三个颜色通道为红色，绿色和蓝色。

trans-unit.source: The input is either a string "type" specifying an integer type, or it is an existing integer variable var.
trans-unit.target: 输入可以是指定整数类型的字符串 "type" ，也可以是现有的整数变量 var 。

trans-unit.source: The input is either a string specifying a floating point type, or it is an existing floating point variable <var>var</var>.
trans-unit.target: 输入可以是指定浮点类型的字符串，也可以是现有的浮点变量 <var>var</var> 。

trans-unit.source: The input is interpreted as a sequence of words, delimiters (such as whitespace), and literals. The characters that form delimiters and whitespace are determined by the options. The format consists of format specifiers interspersed between literals. In the format, whitespace forms a delimiter between consecutive literals, but is otherwise ignored.
trans-unit.target: 输入的内容被解释为一连串的单词、定界符(如空格)和字符。构成定界符和空白的字符由选项决定。格式由穿插在字符之间的格式指定符组成。在格式中,空格在连续的字元之间形成定界符,但在其他情况下会被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The input matrix <var>pts</var> of size [n, dim] contains n points in a space of dimension dim.
trans-unit.target: 大小为[n，dim] 的输入矩阵 <var>pts</var> 在维度为dim的空间中包含n个点。

trans-unit.source: The input matrix <var>pts</var> of size [n, dim] contains n points in a space of dimension dim. The return matrix <var>T</var> has size [m, dim+1]. Each row of <var>T</var> contains a set of indices back into the original set of points <var>pts</var> which describes a simplex of dimension dim. For example, a 2-D simplex is a triangle and 3-D simplex is a tetrahedron.
trans-unit.target: 大小为[n，dim] 的输入矩阵 <var>pts</var> 在维度为dim的空间中包含n个点。返回矩阵 <var>T</var> 的大小为[m，dim + 1]。 <var>T</var> 的每一行都包含一组返回到原始点 <var>pts</var> 的索引，这些索引描述了尺寸为dim的单纯形。例如，2-D单形是三角形，而3-D单形是四面体。

trans-unit.source: The input may be a date vector (see datevec), datestr (see datestr), or directly specified as input.
trans-unit.target: 输入可以是日期向量（请参见 datevec ），datestr（请参见 datestr ）或直接指定为输入。

trans-unit.source: The input may be of class uint8, int8, uint16, int16, single, or double. The output is of the same class as the input.

trans-unit.source: The input parameter options is a 2-D vector of the form [scale, n]. The first parameter scales the start radius of the streamtubes (default 1). The second parameter specifies the number of vertices that are used to construct the tube circumference (default 20).

The input parameter options is a 2-D vector of the form [scale, n]. The first parameter scales the tube diameter (default 1). The second parameter specifies the number of vertices that are used to construct the tube circumference (default 20).

The input parameter options is a 2-D vector of the form [stepsize, max_vertices]. The first parameter specifies the step size used for trajectory integration (default 0.1). A negative value is allowed which will reverse the direction of integration. The second parameter specifies the maximum number of segments used to create a streamline (default 10,000).

trans-unit.source: The input patch can be represented by a structure fv with the fields faces and vertices, by two matrices faces and vertices (see, e.g., the result of isosurface), or by a handle to a patch object patch_handle (see patch).
trans-unit.target: 输入面片可以用具有 faces 和 vertices 字段的结构 fv ，两个矩阵 faces 和 vertices （例如，参见 isosurface 的结果）或面片对象 patch_handle 的句柄来表示（请参见patch）。

trans-unit.source: The input variables <var>x</var> and <var>y</var>, must have the same dimension.
trans-unit.target: 输入变量 <var>x</var> 和 <var>y</var> 必须具有相同的尺寸。

trans-unit.target: 输入 <var>t</var> 可以是二维字符数组，也可以是字符串的单元格数组。输出与输入是同一类。

trans-unit.source: The inputs <var>T</var> and <var>N</var> must be non-negative numeric scalars. If <var>N</var> is unspecified it defaults to 1.
trans-unit.target: 输入 <var>T</var> 和 <var>N</var> 必须为非负数字标量。如果未指定 <var>N</var> ，则默认为1。

trans-unit.source: The inputs <var>a</var> and <var>s</var> may also be cell arrays.
trans-unit.target: 输入 <var>a</var> 和 <var>s</var> 也可以是单元阵列。

trans-unit.source: The inputs <var>theta</var>, <var>phi</var>, and <var>r</var> must be the same shape, or scalar. If called with a single matrix argument then each row of <var>S</var> represents the spherical coordinate (<var>theta</var>, <var>phi</var>, <var>r</var>).
trans-unit.target: 输入 <var>theta</var> ， <var>phi</var> 和 <var>r</var> 必须具有相同的形状或标量。如果使用单个矩阵自变量调用，则 <var>S</var> 的每一行都表示球坐标（ <var>theta</var> ， <var>phi</var> ， <var>r</var> ）。

trans-unit.source: The inputs <var>theta</var>, <var>r</var>, (and <var>z</var>) must be the same shape, or scalar. If called with a single matrix argument then each row of <var>P</var> represents the polar/(cylindrical) coordinate (<var>theta</var>, <var>r</var> (, <var>z</var>)).
trans-unit.target: 输入 <var>theta</var> ， <var>r</var> 和（和 <var>z</var> ）必须具有相同的形状或标量。如果使用单个矩阵自变量调用，则 <var>P</var> 的每一行代表极/（圆柱）坐标（ <var>theta</var> ， <var>r</var> （， <var>z</var> ））。

trans-unit.source: The inputs x and y are the coordinates of the polygon vertices. If the inputs are matrices then the rows represent different vertices and each column produces a different polygon. fill will close any open polygons before plotting.
trans-unit.target: 输入 x 和 y 是多边形顶点的坐标。如果输入是矩阵，则行代表不同的顶点，每列产生不同的多边形。在绘制之前， fill 将关闭所有打开的多边形。

trans-unit.source: The inputs <var>x</var>, <var>y</var> (, and <var>z</var>) must be the same shape, or scalar. If called with a single matrix argument then each row of <var>C</var> represents the Cartesian coordinate (<var>x</var>, <var>y</var> (, <var>z</var>)).
trans-unit.target: 输入 <var>x</var> ， <var>y</var> （和 <var>z</var> ）必须具有相同的形状或标量。如果使用单个矩阵参数调用，则 <var>C</var> 的每一行都表示笛卡尔坐标（ <var>x</var> ， <var>y</var> （， <var>z</var> ））。

trans-unit.source: The inputs <var>x</var>, <var>y</var>, and <var>z</var> must be the same shape, or scalar. If called with a single matrix argument then each row of <var>C</var> represents the Cartesian coordinate (<var>x</var>, <var>y</var>, <var>z</var>).
trans-unit.target: 输入 <var>x</var> ， <var>y</var> 和 <var>z</var> 必须具有相同的形状或标量。如果使用单个矩阵参数调用，则 <var>C</var> 的每一行都表示笛卡尔坐标（ <var>x</var> ， <var>y</var> ， <var>z</var> ）。

trans-unit.source: The inputs <var>xc</var>, <var>yc</var>, <var>zc</var> specify the center of the ellipsoid. The inputs <var>xr</var>, <var>yr</var>, <var>zr</var> specify the semi-major axis lengths.
trans-unit.target: 输入 <var>xc</var> ， <var>yc</var> ， <var>zc</var> 指定椭球的中心。输入 <var>xr</var> ， <var>yr</var> ， <var>zr</var> 指定半长轴长度。

trans-unit.source: The inputs should be empty, but are ignored if they are present.
trans-unit.target: 输入应该是空的,但如果存在,则会被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The integer part, floor (days) counts the number of complete days in the date input.
trans-unit.target: 整数部分 floor (days) 计算日期输入中完整天数。

trans-unit.source: The integer range may optionally be described by a two element matrix with a lower and upper bound in which case the returned integers will be on the interval [<var>imin</var>, <var>imax</var>].
trans-unit.target: 整数范围可以选择由具有上下限的两个元素矩阵描述，在这种情况下，返回的整数将位于区间[ <var>imin</var> ， <var>imax</var> ]上。

trans-unit.source: The integral part, floor (now) corresponds to the number of days between today and Jan 1, 0000.
trans-unit.target: 整数部分（ floor (now) 对应于从今天到0000年1月1日之间的天数。

trans-unit.source: The intended use nthargout is to avoid intermediate variables. For example, when finding the indices of the maximum entry of a matrix, the following two compositions of nthargout
trans-unit.target: nthargout 的预期用途是避免中间变量。例如，当找到矩阵最大条目的索引时，nthargout的以下两个组成

trans-unit.source: The interface is centered around supporting the languages C++, C, and Fortran. Octave itself is written in C++ and can call external C++/C code through its native oct-file interface. The C language is also supported through the mex-file interface for compatibility with <small>MATLAB</small>. Fortran code is easiest to reach through the oct-file interface.
trans-unit.target: 该界面以支持C ++，C和Fortran语言为中心。八度本身是用C ++编写的，可以通过其本机八进制文件接口调用外部C ++ / C代码。还通过mex-file接口支持C语言，以与<small>MATLAB</small>兼容。最容易通过八文件接口访问Fortran代码。

trans-unit.source: The interpolation <var>method</var> is one of:
trans-unit.target: 插值 <var>method</var> 是以下之一：

trans-unit.source: The interpolation method can be "nearest" or "linear". If method is omitted it defaults to "linear".
trans-unit.target: 插值方法可以是 "nearest" 或 "linear" 。如果省略method，则默认为 "linear" 。

trans-unit.source: The interpolation method can be "nearest", "cubic" or "linear". If method is omitted it defaults to "linear".
trans-unit.target: 插值方法可以是 "nearest" ， "cubic" 或 "linear" 。如果省略method，则默认为 "linear" 。

trans-unit.source: The interpolation points are all (xi, yi). If xi, yi are vectors then they are made into a 2-D mesh.
trans-unit.target: 插值点均为 (xi, yi) 。如果 xi ， yi 是向量，则将它们制成二维网格。

trans-unit.source: The interpreter property can take three values: "none", "tex", "latex". If the interpreter is set to "none" then no special rendering occurs—the displayed text is a verbatim copy of the specified text. Currently, the "latex" interpreter is not implemented for on-screen display and is equivalent to "none". Note that Octave does not parse or validate the text strings when in "latex" mode—it is the responsibility of the programmer to generate valid strings which may include wrapping sections that should appear in Math mode with '$' characters.
trans-unit.target: 解释器属性可以采用三个值： "none" ， "tex" 和 "latex" 。如果解释器设置为 "none" 则不会进行特殊渲染-显示的文本是指定文本的逐字副本。当前， "latex" 解释器尚未实现在屏幕上显示，等效于 "none" 。请注意，在 "latex" 模式下，Octave不会解析或验证文本字符串-程序员有责任生成有效的字符串，其中可能包括在数学模式下应以 '$' 字符出现的换行部分。

trans-unit.source: The interrupting callback is discarded.
trans-unit.target: 中断回调被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: The interrupting callback is executed after the executing callback has returned.
trans-unit.target: 中断回调是在执行回调返回后执行的。

trans-unit.source: The introductory example (see Basic Usage of Cell Arrays) showed how to create a cell array containing currently available variables. In many situations, however, it is useful to create a cell array and then fill it with data.
trans-unit.target: 入门示例（请参阅单元数组的基本用法）展示了如何创建包含当前可用变量的单元数组。但是，在许多情况下，创建单元格数组然后将其填充数据很有用。

trans-unit.source: The inverse FFT is calculated along the first non-singleton dimension of the array. Thus if x is a matrix, fft (x) computes the inverse FFT for each column of x.
trans-unit.target: 逆FFT是沿着数组的第一个非单维度计算的。因此，如果 x 是矩阵，则 fft (x) 为 x 的每一列计算逆FFT 。

trans-unit.source: The inverse complementary error function is defined such that
trans-unit.target: 逆互补误差函数的定义是这样的,即

trans-unit.source: The inverse error function is defined such that
trans-unit.target: 反误差函数的定义是这样的

trans-unit.source: The inverse of the permute function.
trans-unit.target: permute 函数的逆函数。

trans-unit.source: The last error structure may be set by passing a scalar structure, <var>err</var>, as input. Any fields of <var>err</var> that match those above are set while any unspecified fields are initialized with default values.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过传递标量结构 <var>err</var> 作为输入来设置最后一个错误结构。设置与上面匹配的任何 <var>err</var> 字段，同时使用默认值初始化所有未指定的字段。

trans-unit.source: The last six characters of template must be "XXXXXX" and these are replaced with a string that makes the filename unique. The file is then created with mode read/write and permissions that are system dependent (on GNU/Linux systems, the permissions will be 0600 for versions of glibc 2.0.7 and later). The file is opened in binary mode and with the O_EXCL flag.
trans-unit.target: template 的最后六个字符必须为 "XXXXXX" 并用使文件名唯一的字符串替换。然后，使用具有系统相关性的读/写模式和权限来创建文件（在GNU / Linux系统上，对于glibc 2.0.7和更高版本，权限将为0600）。该文件以二进制模式打开并带有 O_EXCL 标志。

trans-unit.source: The leaf digits are not sorted. If sorted leaf values are desired, use xs = sort (x) before calling stemleaf (xs).
trans-unit.target: 叶数字未排序。如果排序叶值是期望的，使用 xs = sort (x) 之前调用 stemleaf (xs) 。

trans-unit.source: The least significant bit is <var>n</var> = 1.
trans-unit.target: 最低有效位是 <var>n</var> = 1。

trans-unit.source: The least significant bit is <var>n</var> = 1. <var>val</var> = 0 resets bits and <var>val</var> = 1 sets bits. If no <var>val</var> is specified it defaults to 1 (set bit). All inputs must be the same size or scalars.
trans-unit.target: 最低有效位为 <var>n</var> = <var>val</var> = 0复位位， <var>val</var> = 1设置位。如果未指定 <var>val</var> ，则默认为1（设置位）。所有输入必须具有相同的大小或标量。

trans-unit.source: The left division \ and right division / operators, discussed in the previous section, use direct solvers to resolve a linear equation of the form x = A \ b or x = b / A. Octave also includes a number of functions to solve sparse linear equations using iterative techniques.
trans-unit.target: 在上一节中讨论过的左除法 \ 和右除法 / 运算符使用直接求解器来求解形式为 x = A \ b 或 x = b / A 的线性方程。Octave还包括许多函数，可使用迭代技术来求解稀疏线性方程。

trans-unit.source: The left matrix contains the linear indices for each matrix element. The right matrix shows the subscript tuples for the same matrix.
trans-unit.target: 左边的矩阵包含每个矩阵元素的线性指数。右边的矩阵是同一矩阵的下标元组。

trans-unit.source: The left matrix contains the subscript tuples for each matrix element. The right matrix shows the linear indices for the same matrix.
trans-unit.target: 左边的矩阵包含每个矩阵元素的下标元组。右边的矩阵是同一矩阵的线性指数。

trans-unit.source: The left side of a multiple assignment expression is itself a list of expressions, that is, a list of variable names potentially qualified by index expressions. See also Index Expressions, and Assignment Ops.
trans-unit.target: 多重赋值表达式的左侧本身是表达式列表，即，可能由索引表达式限定的变量名列表。另请参见索引表达式和赋值操作。

trans-unit.source: The left-hand operand of an assignment need not be a variable (see Variables). It can also be an element of a matrix (see Index Expressions) or a list of return values (see Calling Functions). These are all called lvalues, which means they can appear on the left-hand side of an assignment operator. The right-hand operand may be any expression. It produces the new value which the assignment stores in the specified variable, matrix element, or list of return values.
trans-unit.target: 赋值的左侧操作数不必是变量（请参见Variables）。它也可以是矩阵的元素（请参见Index Expressions）或返回值列表（请参见Calling Functions）。这些都是所谓的左值，这意味着他们可以在赋值运算符的左侧出现。右侧操作数可以是任何表达式。它产生新值，该赋值存储在指定变量，矩阵元素或返回值列表中。

trans-unit.source: The legend FontSize property is initially set to 90% of the axes FontSize to which it is attached. Use set to override this if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 图例的 FontSize 属性最初设置为其所附接的 FontSize 轴的90％。如有必要，使用 set 覆盖它。

trans-unit.source: The length is 0 for empty objects, 1 for scalars, and the number of elements for vectors. For matrix or N-dimensional objects, the length is the number of elements along the largest dimension (equivalent to max (size (a))).
trans-unit.target: 空对象的长度为0，标量的长度为1，向量的元素数为。对于矩阵或N维对象，长度是沿最大维（相当于 max (size (a)) ）的元素数。

trans-unit.source: The length of the recording in seconds (<var>length</var>) must be specified.
trans-unit.target: 必须指定以秒为单位的记录 <var>length</var> （length）。

trans-unit.source: The level curves are taken from the contour matrix c computed by contourc for the same arguments; see the latter for their interpretation.
trans-unit.target: 水平曲线从下轮廓矩阵采取 c 通过计算 contourc 为相同的参数; 见后者的解释。

trans-unit.source: The level of diagnostic printout (0|1|2). If disp is 0 then diagnostics are disabled. The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 诊断打印输出的级别（0 | 1 | 2）。如果 disp 为0，则禁用诊断。默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: The level of verbosity of the warning system may also be controlled by two modes <var>mode</var>:
trans-unit.target: 警告系统的详细级别也可以由两种模式控制 <var>mode</var> ：

trans-unit.source: The libraries Octave uses itself can be utilized in standalone applications. These applications then have access, for example, to the array and matrix classes, as well as to all of the Octave algorithms. The following C++ program, uses class Matrix from
trans-unit.target: Octave本身使用的库可以在独立的应用程序中使用。例如,这些应用程序可以访问数组和矩阵类,以及Octave的所有算法。下面的C++程序,使用了来自

trans-unit.source: The light position is specified by an azimuthal rotation <var>az</var> and an elevation angle <var>el</var>, both in degrees.

The light source location and viewer location vectors are specified using parameters <var>lv</var> and <var>vv</var> respectively. The location vectors can given as 2-element vectors [azimuth, elevation] in degrees or as 3-element vectors [x, y, z].
trans-unit.target: 分别使用参数 <var>lv</var> 和 <var>vv</var> 指定光源位置和观看者位置向量。位置矢量可以以度为单位的2元素矢量[方位角，高程]或以3元素矢量[x，y，z]给出。

trans-unit.source: The light source location may be specified using <var>lsrc</var> which can be a 2-element vector [azimuth, elevation] in degrees, or a 3-element vector [lx, ly, lz]. The default value is rotated 45 degrees counterclockwise to the current view.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 <var>lsrc</var> 来指定光源位置，该lsrc可以是以度为单位的2元素向量[方位角，高程]，也可以是3元素向量[lx，ly，lz]。默认值逆时针旋转45度到当前视图。

trans-unit.source: The light source location vector <var>lv</var> can be given as a 2-element vector [azimuth, elevation] in degrees or as a 3-element vector [x, y, z].
trans-unit.target: 光源位置矢量 <var>lv</var> 可以以度为单位的2元素矢量[方位角，仰角]或以3元素矢量[x，y，z]的形式给出。

trans-unit.source: The lighting effects are only visible if at least one light object is present and visible in the same axes.
trans-unit.target: 只有在同一轴线上至少有一个光照物体存在并可见时,光照效果才会显现。

trans-unit.source: The limit is measured in kilobytes and is applied to the top-level workspace. The name of the crash dump file is specified by <var>octave_core_file_name</var>.
trans-unit.target: 该限制以千字节为单位，并应用于顶级工作空间。故障转储文件的名称由 <var>octave_core_file_name</var> 指定。

trans-unit.source: The limits argument should be a 2-element vector specifying the lower and upper limits to assign to the first and last value in the colormap. Data values outside this range are clamped to the first and last colormap entries.
trans-unit.target: limits参数应该是一个2元素向量,指定要分配给colormap中第一个和最后一个值的下限和上限。在这个范围之外的数据值会被限制在colormap的第一个和最后一个条目上。

trans-unit.source: The limits of the plot are of the form [xlo, xhi] or [xlo, xhi, ylo, yhi]. If no limits are specified the default is [-5, 5].
trans-unit.target: 图的极限形式为 [xlo, xhi] 或 [xlo, xhi, ylo, yhi] 。如果未指定限制，则默认值为 [-5, 5] 。

trans-unit.source: The line and the arrowhead can be customized as for arrow annotations, but some property names are duplicated: "head1length"/"head2length", "head1width"/"head2width", etc. The index 1 marks the properties of the arrowhead at the first point in x and y coordinates.

trans-unit.target: 可以使用 "linewidth" ， "linestyle" 和 "color" 属性自定义线，方法与 line 对象相同。

trans-unit.source: The loop works like this: first, the value of i is set to 3. Then, the while tests whether i is less than or equal to 10. This is the case when i equals 3, so the value of the i-th element of fib is set to the sum of the previous two values in the sequence. Then the i++ increments the value of i and the loop repeats. The loop terminates when i reaches 11.
trans-unit.target: 循环的工作方式如下：首先，将 i 的值设置为3。然后， while 测试 i 是否小于或等于10。这是当 i 等于3 时的情况，因此第 i 个元素的值的 fib 被设置为序列中的前两个值的总和。然后， i++ 增量的值 i 和循环重复。当 i 达到11 时，循环终止。

trans-unit.source: The match is performed at the end of each path element. For example, if dir is "foo/bar", it matches the path element "/some/dir/foo/bar", but not "/some/dir/foo/bar/baz""/some/dir/allfoo/bar". When dir is an absolute name, rather than just a path fragment, it is matched against the file system instead of Octave’s loadpath. In this case, if dir exists it will be returned in dirname, otherwise an empty string is returned.

trans-unit.source: The minimum requirement, as previously discussed, is to check the number of input arguments before using them to avoid referencing a nonexistent argument. However, in some cases this might not be sufficient as the underlying code imposes further constraints. For example, an external function call might be undefined if the input arguments are not integers, or if one of the arguments is zero, or if the input is complex and a real value was expected. Therefore, oct-files often need additional input parameter checking.
trans-unit.target: 如前文所述,最低要求是在使用输入参数之前检查输入参数的数量,以避免引用一个不存在的参数。然而,在某些情况下,这可能是不够的,因为底层代码施加了进一步的限制。例如,如果输入参数不是整数,或者其中一个参数为零,或者输入是复杂的,而预期的是实值,那么外部函数调用可能会被未定义。因此,八进制文件通常需要额外的输入参数检查。

trans-unit.source: The most common and easiest way to create a diagonal matrix is using the built-in function diag. The expression diag (v), with v a vector, will create a square diagonal matrix with elements on the main diagonal given by the elements of v, and size equal to the length of v. diag (v, m, n) can be used to construct a rectangular diagonal matrix. The result of these expressions will be a special diagonal matrix object, rather than a general matrix object.
trans-unit.target: 创建对角矩阵的最常见和最简单的方法是使用内置函数diag。用 v 为向量的 diag (v) 表达式将创建一个对角矩阵，其对角线上的元素由 v 的元素给定，其大小等于 v 的长度。 diag (v, m, n) 可用于构造矩形对角矩阵。这些表达式的结果将是一个特殊的对角矩阵对象，而不是一个普通的矩阵对象。

trans-unit.source: The newer gesdd routine is based on a Divide-and-Conquer algorithm that is 5X faster than the alternative gesvd, which is based on QR factorization. However, the new algorithm can use significantly more memory. For an MxN input matrix the memory usage is of order O(min(M,N) ^ 2), whereas the alternative is of order O(max(M,N)).
trans-unit.target: 较新的 gesdd 例程基于分而治之算法，该算法比基于QR分解的替代 gesvd 快5倍。但是，新算法可以使用更多的内存。对于MxN输入矩阵，内存使用量为O（min（M，N）^ 2），而替代方案为O（max（M，N））。

trans-unit.source: The newly added paths appear in the load path in the same order that they appear in the arguments of addpath. When extending the load path to the front, the last path in the list of arguments is added first. When extending the load path to the end, the first path in the list of arguments is added first.
The next argument is treated as a filename. All variables found within the specified file are listed. No patterns are accepted when reading variables from a file.

The numbers in the vector native_bytes are rounded and clipped to integers between 0 and 255. This byte stream is then mapped into the code page given by the string codepage and returned in the string utf8_str. Octave uses UTF-8 as its internal encoding. The string codepage must be an identifier of a valid code page. Examples for valid code pages are "ISO-8859-1", "Shift-JIS", or "UTF-16". For a list of supported code pages, see https://www.gnu.org/software/libiconv. If codepage is omitted or empty, the system default codepage is used.
trans-unit.target: 将向量 native_bytes 中的数字四舍五入并裁剪为0到255之间的整数。然后，将此字节流映射到字符串 codepage 给定的代码页中，并以字符串 utf8_str 返回。八度使用UTF-8作为其内部编码。字符串 codepage 必须是有效代码页的标识符。有效代码页的示例是 "ISO-8859-1" ， "Shift-JIS" 或 "UTF-16" 。有关受支持的代码页的列表，请参见https://www.gnu.org/software/libiconv。如果 codepage 被省略或为空，则使用系统默认代码页。

trans-unit.source: The observation errors, e, are assumed to originate from an underlying p-variate distribution with zero mean and p-by-p covariance matrix S, both constant conditioned on x. Furthermore, the matrix S is constant with respect to each observation such that mean (e) = 0 and cov (vec (e)) = kron (s, I). (For cases that don’t meet this criteria, such as autocorrelated errors, see generalized least squares, gls, for more efficient estimations.)
trans-unit.target: 假设观察误差 e 源自具有零均值和p- by- p协方差矩阵 S 的基础p变量分布，二者均以 x 为常数。此外，矩阵 S 对于每次观察都是恒定的，以致 mean (e) = 0 e ）= 0且 cov (vec (e)) = kron (s, I) e ））= kron（ s ， I ）。 （对于不符合此条件的情况，例如自相关错误，请参阅广义最小二乘gls，以获得更有效的估计。）

trans-unit.source: The observation errors, e, are assumed to originate from an underlying p-variate distribution with zero mean but possibly heteroscedastic observations. That is, in general, mean (e) = 0 and cov (vec (e)) = (s^2)*o in which s is a scalar and o is a t*p-by-t*p matrix.
trans-unit.target: 假设观测误差 e 源自具有零均值但可能为异方差观测的基础p变量分布。也就是说，一般而言， mean (e) = 0 且 cov (vec (e)) = (s^2)*o ，其中s是标量， o 是t * p - t * p * p矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The only thing remaining to make this class usable is a method for processing data. But before that, it is usually desirable to also have a way of changing the data stored in a class. Since the fields in the underlying struct are private by default, it is necessary to provide a mechanism to access the fields. The subsref method may be used for both tasks.
trans-unit.target: 使此类可用的唯一方法是处理数据的方法。但是在此之前，通常还需要一种更改存储在类中的数据的方法。由于默认情况下基础结构中的字段是私有的，因此有必要提供一种访问字段的机制。该 subsref 方法可用于这两项任务。

trans-unit.source: The optional "type" input determines the class of the variable used for calculations. By default, operations on floating point inputs (double or single) are performed in their native data type, while operations on integer, logical, and character data types are performed using doubles. If the argument "native" is given, then the operation is performed in the same type as the original argument.

trans-unit.source: The optional argument <var>tol</var> is a 1- or 2-element vector that specifies the desired accuracy of the result. The first element of the vector is the desired absolute tolerance, and the second element is the desired relative tolerance. To choose a relative test only, set the absolute tolerance to zero. To choose an absolute test only, set the relative tolerance to zero. The default absolute tolerance is 1e-10 (1e-5 for single), and the default relative tolerance is 1e-6 (1e-4 for single).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数 <var>tol</var> 是1或2元素向量，用于指定结果的期望精度。向量的第一个元素是所需的绝对公差，第二个元素是所需的相对公差。仅选择相对测试，将绝对公差设置为零。要仅选择绝对测试，请将相对公差设置为零。默认的绝对公差为1e-10（单身为1e-5），默认的相对公差为1e-6（单身为1e-4）。

trans-unit.source: The optional argument tol is a vector that specifies the desired accuracy of the result. The first element of the vector is the desired absolute tolerance, and the second element is the desired relative tolerance. To choose a relative test only, set the absolute tolerance to zero. To choose an absolute test only, set the relative tolerance to zero. Both tolerances default to sqrt (eps) or approximately 1.5e-8.
trans-unit.target: 可选参数 tol 是一个向量，用于指定结果的期望精度。向量的第一个元素是所需的绝对公差，第二个元素是所需的相对公差。仅选择相对测试，将绝对公差设置为零。要仅选择绝对测试，请将相对公差设置为零。两种公差均默认为 sqrt (eps) 或约1.5e-8。

trans-unit.source: The optional arguments <var>fs</var>, <var>nbits</var>, <var>channels</var>, and <var>id</var> specify the sample rate, bit depth, number of channels and recording device id, respectively. Device IDs may be found using the audiodevinfo function.
trans-unit.target: 可选参数 <var>fs</var> ， <var>nbits</var> ， <var>channels</var> 和 <var>id</var> 分别指定采样率，位深度，通道数和记录设备id。可以使用audiodevinfo函数找到设备ID。

trans-unit.source: The optional arguments <var>m</var> and <var>n</var> may be used specify the number of rows and columns of <var>A</var> to use. If either of these is larger than the size of <var>A</var>, <var>A</var> is resized and padded with zeros.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用可选参数 <var>m</var> 和 <var>n</var> 指定要使用的 <var>A</var> 的行数和列数。如果其中任何一个大于 <var>A</var> 的大小，那么 <var>A</var> 调整A的大小并用零填充。

trans-unit.source: The optional arguments <var>nbits</var>, and <var>id</var> specify the bit depth and player device id, respectively. Device IDs may be found using the audiodevinfo function. Given an audioplayer object, use the data from the object to initialize the player.
trans-unit.target: 可选参数 <var>nbits</var> 和 <var>id</var> 分别指定位深度和播放器设备ID。可以使用audiodevinfo函数找到设备ID。给定一个audioplayer对象，使用该对象中的数据初始化播放器。

trans-unit.source: The optional fifth argument ode_opt specifies non-default options to the ODE solver. It is a structure generated by odeset.
trans-unit.target: 可选的第五个参数 ode_opt 为ODE求解器指定非默认选项。它是由 odeset 生成的结构。

trans-unit.source: The optional fourth argument ode_opt specifies non-default options to the ODE solver. It is a structure generated by odeset.
trans-unit.target: 可选的第四个参数 ode_opt 为ODE求解器指定非默认选项。它是由 odeset 生成的结构。

trans-unit.source: The optional fourth argument ode_opt specifies non-default options to the ODE solver. It is a structure generated by odeset. ode23s will ignore the following options: "BDF", "InitialSlope", "MassSingular", "MStateDependence", "MvPattern", "MaxOrder", "Non-negative".

The optional input "inputmin" replaces all elements less than the specified value inmin with inmin. Similarly, the optional input "inputmax" replaces all elements greater than the specified value inmax with inmax. If unspecified the minimum and maximum are taken from the data itself (inmin = min (A(:)) and inmax = max (A(:))).
The optional input <var>explode</var> is a vector of the same length as <var>x</var> that, if nonzero, "explodes" the slice from the pie chart.
trans-unit.target: 可选输入 <var>explode</var> 是一个与 <var>x</var> 长度相同的向量，如果不为零，则从饼图中“爆炸”切​​片。

trans-unit.source: The optional input <var>labels</var> is a cell array of strings of the same length as <var>x</var> specifying the label for each slice.
trans-unit.target: 可选的输入 <var>labels</var> 是与 <var>x</var> 长度相同的字符串单元格数组，为每个切片指定标签。

trans-unit.source: The optional input loc determines the location of the colorbar. If present, it must be the last argument to colorbar. Valid values for loc are
trans-unit.target: 可选的输入 loc 确定彩条的位置。如果存在，它必须是 colorbar 的最后一个参数。有效值 loc 是

trans-unit.source: The optional input <var>maxlength</var> specifies the maximum length of any string in <var>uniqstr</var>. If an input string cannot be made unique without exceeding <var>maxlength</var> an error is emitted.
trans-unit.target: 可选输入 <var>maxlength</var> 指定 <var>uniqstr</var> 中任何字符串的最大长度。如果输入字符串不能在不超过制成独特 <var>maxlength</var> 错误被发射。

trans-unit.source: The optional input <var>n</var> (format repeat count) specifies the number of times the format string is to be used or the number of lines to be read, whichever happens first while reading. The former is equivalent to requesting that the data output vectors should be of length <var>N</var>. Note that when reading files with format strings referring to multiple lines, <var>n</var> should rather be the number of lines to be read than the number of format string uses.
trans-unit.target: 可选输入 <var>n</var> （格式重复计数）指定格式字符串的使用次数或读取的行数，以读取时先发生的为准。前者相当于请求该数据输出向量应的长度 <var>N</var> 。请注意，当读取格式字符串涉及多行的文件时， <var>n</var> 应该是要读取的行数，而不是格式字符串使用的数目。

trans-unit.source: The optional input <var>n</var> determines the number of faces around the circumference of the cylinder. The default value is 20.
trans-unit.target: 可选输入 <var>n</var> 确定圆柱体圆周周围的面数。预设值为20。

trans-unit.source: The optional input <var>n</var> determines the number of faces around the circumference of the sphere. The default value is 20.
trans-unit.target: 可选输入 <var>n</var> 确定围绕球体圆周的面数。预设值为20。

trans-unit.source: The optional input <var>opt_iters</var> is the maximum number of square roots to compute and defaults to 100.
trans-unit.target: 可选输入 <var>opt_iters</var> 是要计算的最大平方根数，默认为100。

trans-unit.source: The optional input r is a vector specifying the radius along the unit z-axis. The default is [1 1] indicating radius 1 at Z == 0 and at Z == 1.
trans-unit.target: 可选输入 r 是一个向量，用于指定沿单位z轴的半径。默认值为[1 1]，表示 Z == 0 和 Z == 1 半径1。

trans-unit.source: The optional input <var>s</var> is a scalar defining a scaling factor to use for the arrows of the field relative to the mesh spacing. A value of 1.0 will result in the longest vector exactly filling one grid cube. A value of 0 disables all scaling. The default value is 0.9.
trans-unit.target: 可选输入 <var>s</var> 是一个标量，定义了比例因子，用于相对于网格间距的字段箭头。值1.0将导致最长的向量正好填满一个网格立方体。值为0将禁用所有缩放。默认值为0.9。

trans-unit.source: The optional input <var>s</var> is a scalar defining a scaling factor to use for the arrows of the field relative to the mesh spacing. A value of 1.0 will result in the longest vector exactly filling one grid square. A value of 0 disables all scaling. The default value is 0.9.
trans-unit.target: 可选输入 <var>s</var> 是一个标量，定义了比例因子，用于相对于网格间距的字段箭头。值为1.0将导致最长的向量正好填充一个网格正方形。值为0将禁用所有缩放。默认值为0.9。

trans-unit.source: The optional input stem_sz sets the width of each stem. The stem width is determined by 10^(stem_sz + 1). The default stem width is 10.
trans-unit.target: 可选输入 stem_sz 设置每个茎的宽度。茎宽由 10^(stem_sz + 1) 。默认词干宽度为10。

trans-unit.source: The optional input <var>t</var> specifies the number of test vectors (default 5).
trans-unit.target: 可选输入 <var>t</var> 指定测试向量的数量（默认为5）。

trans-unit.source: The optional input <var>title</var> (character string) can be used to decorate the dialog caption.
trans-unit.target: 可选的输入 <var>title</var> （字符串）可用于装饰对话框标题。

trans-unit.source: The optional input tol controls the stopping tolerance of the algorithm and defaults to eps (class (m)). The tolerance can be increased to compute a faster, less accurate approximation.
trans-unit.target: 可选的输入 tol 控制算法的停止公差，默认为 eps (class (m)) 。可以增加公差以计算更快，更不准确的近似值。

trans-unit.source: The optional input <var>tol</var> is currently ignored (<small>MATLAB</small> uses this to allow faster, less accurate approximation).
trans-unit.target: 当前忽略了可选的输入 <var>tol</var> （<small>MATLAB</small>使用它来允许更快，更不准确的近似值）。

trans-unit.source: The optional input vn is either a scalar denoting the number of contour lines to compute or a vector containing the Z values where lines will be computed. When vn is a vector the number of contour lines is numel (vn). However, to compute a single contour line at a given value use vn = [val, val]. If vn is omitted it defaults to 10.
trans-unit.target: 可选输入 vn 是表示要计算的轮廓线数量的标量，或者是包含将要计算线的Z值的向量。当 vn 是向量时，轮廓线的数量为 numel (vn) 。但是，要计算给定值的单个轮廓线，请使用 vn = [val, val] 。如果省略 vn ，则默认为10。

trans-unit.source: The optional input <var>w</var> controls the width of the bars. A value of 1.0 will cause each bar to exactly touch any adjacent bars. The default width is 0.8.
trans-unit.target: 可选输入 <var>w</var> 控制条的宽度。值1.0将导致每个条形图完全接触任何相邻的条形图。默认宽度为0.8。

trans-unit.source: The optional input <var>y</var> defaults to 19 if it is not supplied.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供可选输入 <var>y</var> ,则默认为19。

trans-unit.source: The optional input argument <var>V</var> may be an n-element vector of positive weights (inverse variances), or an n-by-n symmetric positive semi-definite matrix representing the covariance of <var>b</var>. If <var>V</var> is not supplied, the ordinary least squares solution is returned.
trans-unit.target: 可选输入参数 <var>V</var> 可以是正权重（逆方差）的n元素矢量，也可以是表示 <var>b</var> 的协方差的n×n对称正半定矩阵。如果未提供 <var>V</var> ，则返回普通最小二乘法。

trans-unit.source: The optional input argument <var>col</var>, which is a three-dimensional array of the same size as <var>v</var>, specifies coloring of the isosurface. The color data is interpolated, as necessary, to match <var>isoval</var>. The output structure array, in this case, has the additional field <var>facevertexcdata</var>.
trans-unit.target: 可选输入参数 <var>col</var> 是与 <var>v</var> 大小相同的三维数组，用于指定等值面的颜色。根据需要对颜色数据进行插值以匹配 <var>isoval</var> 。在这种情况下，输出结构数组具有附加字段 <var>facevertexcdata</var> 。

trans-unit.source: The optional input parameter <var>dims</var> should be a vector containing the dimensions of the decoded array.
trans-unit.target: 可选的输入参数 <var>dims</var> 应该是一个包含解码数组维数的向量。

trans-unit.source: The optional inputs [l, u] will scale A to the interval with lower bound l and upper bound u.
The optional message <var>msg</var> is centered and displayed above the waitbar.
trans-unit.target: 可选消息 <var>msg</var> 居中并显示在等待栏上方。

trans-unit.source: The optional numeric argument <var>repeat</var> can be used for limiting the number of items read:

trans-unit.source: The optional output c are the contour levels in contourc format.

trans-unit.source: The optional output c contains the contour levels in contourc format.

trans-unit.source: The optional output err is an approximate bound on the error in the integral abs (q - I), where I is the exact value of the integral. The optional output iter is the number of vectorized function calls to the function f that were used.
trans-unit.target: 可选输出 err 是积分 abs (q - I) 的误差的近似边界，其中 I 是积分的精确值。可选的输出 iter 是所使用的对函数 f 的矢量化函数调用的数量。

trans-unit.source: The optional output <var>filelist</var> is a list of the compressed files.

trans-unit.source: The optional output <var>ismodified</var> is a logical array indicating whether each element in <var>str</var> was modified to make it unique.

trans-unit.source: The optional output <var>ismodified</var> is a logical array indicating whether the respective element in <var>str</var> was a valid name or not.

trans-unit.source: The optional output <var>iters</var> is the number of square roots actually computed.

trans-unit.source: The optional output <var>rline</var> is the real line number where the breakpoint was set. This can differ from the specified line if the line is not executable. For example, if a breakpoint attempted on a blank line then Octave will set the real breakpoint at the next executable line.

trans-unit.source: The optional parameter <var>line_style</var> defines the output style for the plot. Called with no output arguments the graph is plotted directly. Otherwise, return the coordinates of the plot in <var>x</var> and <var>y</var>.

trans-unit.source: The optional parameter <var>n</var> gives the number of dummy <var>x</var>(<var>i</var>) used for initialization, i.e., a sequence of length <var>t</var>+<var>n</var> is generated and <var>x</var>(<var>n</var>+1:<var>t</var>+<var>n</var>) is returned. If <var>n</var> is omitted, <var>n</var> = 100 is used.

trans-unit.source: The optional property periodic is a logical value which specifies whether a periodic boundary condition is applied to the spline. The length of the period is max (breaks) - min (breaks). The default value is false.
trans-unit.target: 可选属性 periodic 是一个逻辑值，它指定是否将周期性边界条件应用于样条曲线。周期的长度为 max (breaks) - min (breaks) 。默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: The optional property <var>robust</var> is a logical value which specifies if robust fitting is to be applied to reduce the influence of outlying data points. Three iterations of weighted least squares are performed. Weights are computed from previous residuals. The sensitivity of outlier identification is controlled by the property <var>beta</var>. The value of <var>beta</var> is restricted to the range, 0 < <var>beta</var> < 1. The default value is <var>beta</var> = 1/2. Values close to 0 give all data equal weighting. Increasing values of <var>beta</var> reduce the influence of outlying data. Values close to unity may cause instability or rank deficiency.
trans-unit.target: 可选属性 <var>robust</var> 是一个逻辑值，它指定是否要应用稳健拟合以减少外围数据点的影响。进行加权最小二乘的三次迭代。权重是根据以前的残差计算得出的。离群值识别的敏感性由属性 <var>beta</var> 控制。 <var>beta</var> 的值限制为0 < <var>beta</var> <1。默认值为 <var>beta</var> = 1/2。接近0的值赋予所有数据相等的权重。 <var>beta</var> 值的增加减少了外围数据的影响。接近1的值可能会导致不稳定或等级不足。

trans-unit.source: The optional property, constraints, is a structure specifying linear constraints on the fit. The structure has three fields, "xc", "yc", and "cc".
trans-unit.target: 可选属性 constraints 是一种结构，用于指定拟合的线性约束。该结构具有三个字段： "xc" ， "yc" 和 "cc" 。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>count</var> contains the number of elements read.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>count</var> 包含读取的元素数。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> holds the graphics handle(s) to the created text object(s).
The optional return value <var>h</var> is a 2-element vector with a graphics handle for the created bar plot and a second handle for the created line plot.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是2元素向量，带有用于创建的条形图的图形手柄和用于创建的线形图的第二手柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a 2-element vector with a graphics handle for the created mesh plot and a second handle for the created contour plot.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是2元素向量，带有用于创建的网格图的图形手柄和用于创建的轮廓图的第二手柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a 2-element vector with a graphics handle for the created surface plot and a second handle for the created contour plot.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是2元素向量，带有用于创建的曲面图的图形手柄和用于创建的轮廓图的第二手柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a 2-element vector with a graphics handle to the created surface object and to the created contour plot.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是2元素向量，带有用于创建的曲面对象和创建的轮廓图的图形句柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a graphics handle (or vector of handles) to the line objects created.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是创建的线对象的图形手柄（或手柄矢量）。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a graphics handle to a quiver object. A quiver object regroups the components of the quiver plot (body, arrow, and marker), and allows them to be changed together.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是颤动对象的图形句柄。颤动对象重新组合了颤动图的各个组成部分（主体，箭头和标记），并允许将它们一起更改。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value h is a graphics handle to the created annotation object. This can be used with the set function to customize an existing annotation object.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 h 是创建的注释对象的图形句柄。可以将其与 set 函数一起使用以自定义现有注释对象。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value h is a graphics handle to the created bar series hggroup. For a description of the use of the bar series, see bar.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 h 是创建的钢筋系列hggroup的图形句柄。有关bar系列用法的描述，请参见bar。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a graphics handle to the created colorbar object.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是创建的colorbar对象的图形句柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a graphics handle to the created figure object.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是创建的图形对象的图形句柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a graphics handle to the created hggroup object.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是创建的hggroup对象的图形句柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a graphics handle to the created light object.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是创建的灯光对象的图形句柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a graphics handle to the created patch object.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是创建的补丁对象的图形句柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a graphics handle to the created plot.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是创建的图的图形句柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a graphics handle to the created rectangle object.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是创建的矩形对象的图形句柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a graphics handle to the created scatter object.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是创建的散布对象的图形句柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a graphics handle to the created surface object.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是创建的曲面对象的图形句柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a graphics handle to the created text object(s).
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是创建的文本对象的图形句柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a graphics handle to the created text object.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是创建的文本对象的图形句柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a graphics handle to the hggroup comprising the contour lines.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是包含轮廓线的hggroup的图形句柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a graphics handle to the hggroup comprising the field lines.
The optional return value h is a graphics handle to the hggroup object comprising the area patch objects. The "BaseValue" property of the hggroup can be used to adjust the level where shading begins.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 h 是包含区域补丁对象的hggroup对象的图形句柄。 "BaseValue" 的“ BaseValue”属性可用于调整着色开始的级别。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a graphics handle to the hggroup object representing the points.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是表示点的hggroup对象的图形句柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a graphics handle to the image.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是图像的图形句柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a graphics handle to the light object. This can be used to move or further change properties of the light object.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是灯光对象的图形句柄。这可用于移动或进一步更改灯光对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a graphics handle to the plot objects created for each streamtube.
The optional return value <var>h</var> is a graphics handle to the plot objects created for each tube.

The optional return value <var>h</var> is a handle to a "stem series" hggroup. The single hggroup handle has all of the graphical elements comprising the plot as its children; This allows the properties of multiple graphics objects to be changed by modifying just a single property of the "stem series" hggroup.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是“茎系列” hggroup的句柄。单个hggroup句柄将构成该图的所有图形元素作为其子元素；这允许通过仅修改“茎系列” hggroup的单个属性来更改多个图形对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value h is a handle to the "stem series" hggroup containing the line and marker objects used for the plot. See XREFstem, for a description of the "stem series" object.
The optional return value h is a handle to the "stem series" hggroup containing the line and marker objects used for the plot. See stem, for a description of the "stem series" object.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 h 是“茎系列” hggroup的句柄，该组包含用于绘图的线和标记对象。有关“茎系列”对象的描述，请参见stem。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a handle to the hggroup object representing the data plot and errorbars.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是hggroup对象的句柄，代表数据图表和错误栏。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a list of graphics handles to the patch, surface, and text objects generating the plot.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是生成绘图的面片，曲面和文本对象的图形处理列表。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a list of handles to the patch and text objects generating the plot.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是生成图的补丁和文本对象的句柄列表。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a vector of graphics handles to the created line objects.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是创建的线对象的图形句柄的向量。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a vector of graphics handles to the created patch objects.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是创建的补丁对象的图形句柄的向量。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a vector of graphics handles to the created text objects.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是创建的文本对象的图形句柄的向量。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a vector of graphics handles to the line objects representing each histogram.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是表示每个直方图的线对象的图形句柄的向量。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a vector of graphics handles to the line objects representing the drawn vectors.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是表示绘制矢量的线对象的图形句柄的矢量。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a vector of graphics handles to the surface objects representing each ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是表示每个色带的表面对象的图形手柄的向量。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value h is a vector of graphics handles to the text objects representing each label. The "userdata" property of the text objects contains the numerical value of the contour label.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 h 是表示每个标签的文本对象的图形句柄的向量。文本对象的 "userdata" 属性包含轮廓标签的数值。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is a vector of handles to the created "bar series" hggroups with one handle per column of the variable <var>y</var>. This series makes it possible to change a common element in one bar series object and have the change reflected in the other "bar series". For example,
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是创建的“ bar series” hggroup的句柄向量，变量 <var>y</var> 的每一列具有一个句柄。此系列可以更改一个钢筋系列对象中的公共元素，并使更改反映在另一个“钢筋系列”中。例如，

trans-unit.source: The optional return value h is a vector of patch handles where each handle represents one tetrahedron in the order given by T. A typical use case for h is to turn the respective patch "visible" property "on" or "off".
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 h 是补丁句柄的向量，其中每个句柄按 T 给出的顺序表示一个四面体。 h 的典型用例是将相应补丁的 "visible" 属性 "on" 或 "off" 。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> is the graphics handle of the figure window that was cleared.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 是已清除的图形窗口的图形句柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>h</var> provides handles to the individual graphics objects in the scatter plots, whereas <var>ax</var> returns the handles to the scatter plot axes objects.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>h</var> 为散点图中的各个图形对象提供句柄，而 <var>ax</var> 则向散点图中的轴对象返回句柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>hax</var> is a graphics handle to the created axes object (not figure).
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>hax</var> 是已创建轴对象（未显示图形）的图形句柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>hl</var> is a graphics handle to the light object.
The optional return value <var>hui</var> is a graphics handle to the created uipanel object.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>hui</var> 是创建的uipanel对象的图形句柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>hui</var> is a graphics handle to the created uipushtool object.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>hui</var> 是创建的uipushtool对象的图形句柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>hui</var> is a graphics handle to the created uitoolbar object.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>hui</var> 是创建的uitoolbar对象的图形句柄。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value <var>lev</var> is a vector with the Z values of the contour levels.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值 <var>lev</var> 是带有轮廓级别Z值的向量。

trans-unit.source: The optional return value is a list of <var>files</var> unpacked.
trans-unit.target: 可选的返回值是已解压缩 <var>files</var> 的列表。

trans-unit.source: The optional scalar arguments <var>r0</var> and <var>c0</var> define the starting row and column of the data to be read. These values are indexed from zero, i.e., the first data row corresponds to an index of zero.
trans-unit.target: 可选的标量参数 <var>r0</var> 和 <var>c0</var> 定义要读取的数据的起始行和列。这些值从零开始索引，即，第一数据行对应于零索引。

trans-unit.source: The optional second argument <var>class</var> may be used to cause the input array to be interpreted as a different value type. Possible values are
trans-unit.target: 可选的第二个参数 <var>class</var> 可用于使输入数组解释为其他值类型。可能的值是

trans-unit.source: The optional second argument <var>workspace</var> can take the following values:
trans-unit.target: 可选的第二个参数 <var>workspace</var> 可以采用以下值：

trans-unit.source: The optional second argument defines the maximum length of the string representing the elements of <var>x</var>. By default <var>len</var> is 9.
trans-unit.target: 可选的第二个参数定义表示 <var>x</var> 元素的字符串的最大长度。默认情况下， <var>len</var> 为9。

trans-unit.source: The optional second argument defines the maximum length of the string representing the elements of <var>x</var>. By default, <var>len</var> is 9.

The optional second argument determines the amount of output to generate and which types of tests to run. The default value is "normal". Requesting an output argument will suppress printing the final summary message and any intermediate warnings, unless verbose reporting is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 可选的第二个参数确定要生成的输出量以及要运行的测试类型。默认值为 "normal" 。请求输出参数将禁止打印最终摘要消息和任何中间警告，除非启用了详细报告。

trans-unit.source: The optional second argument is a string which defines which axis limits will be linked. The possible values for <var>optstr</var> are:
trans-unit.target: 可选的第二个参数是一个字符串，该字符串定义将链接哪些轴限制。 <var>optstr</var> 的可能值为：

trans-unit.source: The optional second argument may either give the number of significant digits (precision) to be used in the output or a format template string (format) as in sprintf (see Formatted Output). num2str can also process complex numbers.
trans-unit.target: 可选的第二个参数可以给出要在输出中使用的有效位数（ precision ），也可以像 sprintf 一样提供格式模板字符串（ format ）（请参见Formatted Output）。 num2str 也可以处理复数。

trans-unit.source: The optional second argument names a function that defines the constraint functions whose roots are desired during the integration. This function must have the form
trans-unit.target: 可选的第二个参数命名了一个定义约束函数的函数,该函数的根是在积分过程中需要的。这个函数的形式必须是

trans-unit.source: The optional second argument specifies how many diagonals above or below the main diagonal should also be set to zero. The default value of <var>k</var> is zero which includes the main diagonal as part of the result. If the value of <var>k</var> is a nonzero integer then the selection of elements starts at an offset of <var>k</var> diagonals above the main diagonal for positive <var>k</var> or below the main diagonal for negative <var>k</var>. The absolute value of <var>k</var> may not be greater than the number of subdiagonals or superdiagonals.
trans-unit.target: 可选的第二个参数指定在主对角线上方或下方的对角线数量也应设置为零。 <var>k</var> 的默认值为零，其中包括主对角线作为结果的一部分。如果 <var>k</var> 的值是一个非零整数，则元素的选择从正对 <var>k</var> 的主对角线上方或对负 <var>k</var> 的主对角线下方 <var>k</var> 个对角线的偏移处开始。 <var>k</var> 的绝对值不得大于对角线或超对角线的数量。

trans-unit.source: The optional second argument, <var>len</var>, specifies the minimum number of digits in the result.
trans-unit.target: 可选的第二个参数 <var>len</var> 指定结果中的最小位数。

trans-unit.source: The optional second output <var>R</var> is the inverse condition number of <var>A</var> (zero if matrix is singular).
trans-unit.target: 可选的第二个输出 <var>R</var> 是 <var>A</var> 的逆条件数（如果矩阵为奇数，则为零）。

trans-unit.source: The optional second output <var>w</var> are the normalized angular frequencies. For a one-sided calculation <var>w</var> is in the range [0, pi] if <var>nfft</var> is even and [0, pi) if <var>nfft</var> is odd. Similarly, for a two-sided calculation <var>w</var> is in the range [0, 2*pi] or [0, 2*pi) depending on <var>nfft</var>.
trans-unit.target: 可选的第二输出 <var>w</var> 是归一化的角频率。对于单面计算，如果 <var>nfft</var> 为偶数，则 <var>w</var> 在[0，pi]范围内，如果 <var>nfft</var> 为奇数，则在[0，pi）范围内。类似地，对于双向计算，取决于 <var>nfft</var> ， <var>w</var> 在[0，2 * pi]或[0，2 * pi）范围内。

trans-unit.source: The optional second output argument <var>p</var> is the permutation vector which converts the original name order to the new name order.
trans-unit.target: 可选的第二个输出参数 <var>p</var> 是排列向量，它将原始名称顺序转换为新的名称顺序。

trans-unit.source: The optional second output is a numeric indication of the error status. <var>err</var> is 1 if an error condition has been encountered and 0 otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 可选的第二个输出是错误状态的数字指示。如果遇到错误情况，则 <var>err</var> 为1，否则为0。

trans-unit.source: The optional second output is an approximate null vector when cest is large; it satisfies the equation norm (A*v, 1) == norm (A, 1) * norm (v, 1) / est.
trans-unit.target: 当 cest 很大时，可选的第二个输出是近似零向量；它满足方程 norm (A*v, 1) == norm (A, 1) * norm (v, 1) / est 。

trans-unit.source: The optional second output, <var>matches</var>, returns the delimiters which were matched in the original string.
trans-unit.target: 可选的第二个输出 <var>matches</var> 返回与原始字符串匹配的定界符。

trans-unit.source: The optional second output, <var>state</var>, is logically true when the conversion is successful. If the conversion fails the numeric output, <var>x</var>, is empty and <var>state</var> is false.
trans-unit.target: 当转换成功时，可选的第二个输出 <var>state</var> 逻辑上为true。如果转换失败，则数字输出 <var>x</var> 为空，并且 <var>state</var> 为false。

trans-unit.source: The optional seventh argument options is a structure array. Use odeset to generate this structure. The relevant options are RelTol and AbsTol which specify the error thresholds used to compute the initial conditions.
trans-unit.target: 可选的第七个参数 options 是一个结构数组。使用 odeset 生成此结构。相关选项是 RelTol 和 AbsTol ，它们指定用于计算初始条件的错误阈值。

trans-unit.source: The optional string style specifies whether the light is a local point source ("local", the default) or placed at infinite distance ("infinite").
trans-unit.target: 可选的字符串 style 指定光源是局部点光源（默认为 "local" ）还是无限距离（ "infinite" ）放置。

trans-unit.source: The optional string <var>type</var> specifies the type of moment to be computed. Valid options are:
trans-unit.target: 可选的字符串 <var>type</var> 指定要计算的矩的类型。有效选项包括：

trans-unit.source: The optional string argument "nancond" controls whether NaN and NA values should be included ("includenan"), or excluded ("omitnan"), from the data passed to mad. The default is "includenan". Caution: the "omitnan" option is not yet implemented.
trans-unit.target: 可选的字符串参数 "nancond" 控制应从传递给 mad 的数据中包含（或包括） NaN 和 NA 值（ "includenan" ）或排除（（ "omitnan" ））。默认值为 "includenan" 。注意： "omitnan" 选项尚未实现。

trans-unit.source: The optional string argument "nancond" controls whether NaN and NA values should be included ("includenan"), or excluded ("omitnan"), from the data passed to max. The default is "includenan". Caution: the "omitnan" option is not yet implemented.
trans-unit.target: 可选的字符串参数 "nancond" 控制应从传递给 max 的数据中包含（或包括） NaN 和 NA 值（ "includenan" ）或排除（ "omitnan" ）。默认值为 "includenan" 。注意： "omitnan" 选项尚未实现。

trans-unit.source: The optional string argument "nancond" controls whether NaN and NA values should be included ("includenan"), or excluded ("omitnan"), from the data passed to mean. The default is "includenan". Caution: the "omitnan" option is not yet implemented.
trans-unit.target: 可选的字符串参数 "nancond" 控制应从传递给 mean 的数据中包含 NaN 和 NA 值（ "includenan" ）或排除（ "omitnan" ）。默认值为 "includenan" 。注意： "omitnan" 选项尚未实现。

trans-unit.source: The optional string argument "nancond" controls whether NaN and NA values should be included ("includenan"), or excluded ("omitnan"), from the data passed to min. The default is "includenan". Caution: the "omitnan" option is not yet implemented.
trans-unit.target: 可选的字符串参数 "nancond" 控制从传递给 min 的数据中应包含（或包含） NaN 和 NA 值（ "includenan" ）或排除（（ "omitnan" ））。默认值为 "includenan" 。注意： "omitnan" 选项尚未实现。

trans-unit.source: The optional string argument "nancond" controls whether NaN and NA values should be included ("includenan"), or excluded ("omitnan"), from the data passed to movmedian. The default is "includenan". Caution: the "omitnan" option is not yet implemented.
trans-unit.target: 可选的字符串参数 "nancond" 控制应从传递给 movmedian 的数据中包含（或包括） NaN 和 NA 值（ "includenan" ）或排除（（ "omitnan" ））。默认值为 "includenan" 。注意： "omitnan" 选项尚未实现。

trans-unit.source: The optional string argument "nancond" controls whether NaN and NA values should be included ("includenan"), or excluded ("omitnan"), from the data passed to movprod. The default is "includenan". Caution: the "omitnan" option is not yet implemented.

trans-unit.source: The optional third argument, <var>len</var>, specifies the minimum number of digits in the result.
trans-unit.target: 可选的第三个参数 <var>len</var> 指定结果中的最小位数。

trans-unit.source: The optional third input argument specifies a logfile where results of the tests should be written. The logfile may be a character string (fname) or an open file descriptor ID (fid). To enable batch processing, but still print the results to the screen, use stdout for fid.
trans-unit.target: 可选的第三个输入参数指定一个日志文件，应在其中写入测试结果。日志文件可以是字符串（ fname ）或打开文件描述符ID（ fid ）。要启用批处理，但仍将结果打印到屏幕上，请使用 stdout for fid 。

trans-unit.source: The optional third output resnorm is the norm of the vector of residuals. If resnorm is small, decic has successfully computed the initial conditions. If the value of resnorm is large, use RelTol and AbsTol to adjust it.
trans-unit.target: 可选的第三输出 resnorm 范数是残差矢量的范数。如果 resnorm 小，则 decic 已成功计算出初始条件。如果 resnorm 的值很大，请使用 RelTol 和 AbsTol 进行调整。

trans-unit.source: The optional two-element vector argument <var>samples</var> specifies starting and ending frames.
trans-unit.target: 可选的两元素矢量参数 <var>samples</var> 指定了开始帧和结束帧。

trans-unit.source: The optional vector argument <var>size</var> may be used specify the dimensions of the array to be used. If an element of <var>size</var> is smaller than the corresponding dimension of <var>A</var>, then the dimension of <var>A</var> is truncated prior to performing the FFT. Otherwise, if an element of <var>size</var> is larger than the corresponding dimension then <var>A</var> is resized and padded with zeros.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用可选的向量参数 <var>size</var> 来指定要使用的数组的尺寸。如果 <var>size</var> 的元素小于 <var>A</var> 的对应维度，则在执行FFT之前将 <var>A</var> 的维度截断。否则，如果 <var>size</var> 元素大于相应的尺寸，则将调整 <var>A</var> 的大小并用零填充。

trans-unit.source: The optional vector argument <var>size</var> may be used specify the dimensions of the array to be used. If an element of <var>size</var> is smaller than the corresponding dimension of <var>A</var>, then the dimension of <var>A</var> is truncated prior to performing the inverse FFT. Otherwise, if an element of <var>size</var> is larger than the corresponding dimension then <var>A</var> is resized and padded with zeros.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用可选的向量参数 <var>size</var> 来指定要使用的数组的尺寸。如果 <var>size</var> 的元素小于 <var>A</var> 的对应维度，则在执行逆FFT之前将 <var>A</var> 的维度截断。否则，如果 <var>size</var> 元素大于相应的尺寸，则将调整 <var>A</var> 的大小并用零填充。

trans-unit.source: The order of the Bessel function <var>alpha</var> must be real. The kind of Hankel function is specified by <var>k</var> and may be either first (<var>k</var> = 1) or second (<var>k</var> = 2). The default is Hankel functions of the first kind. The points for evaluation <var>x</var> may be complex.

trans-unit.source: The patterns are considered to be regular expressions when matching the variables to display. The same pattern syntax accepted by the regexp function is used.
trans-unit.target: 当匹配要显示的变量时，模式被视为正则表达式。使用 regexp 函数接受的相同模式语法。

trans-unit.source: The permission mask is a UNIX concept used when creating new objects on a file system such as files, directories, or named FIFOs. The object to be created has base permissions in an octal number mode which are modified according to the octal value of mask. The final permissions for the new object are mode - mask.
trans-unit.target: 权限掩码是在文件系统上创建新对象（例如文件，目录或命名FIFO）时使用的UNIX概念。要创建的对象具有八进制数 mode 基本权限，该权限根据 mask 的八进制值进行修改。新对象的最终许可权是 mode - mask 。

trans-unit.source: The primary distinction is that an assumed zero, when multiplied by any number, or divided by any nonzero number, yields always a zero, even when, e.g., multiplied by Inf or divided by NaN. The reason for this behavior is that the numerical multiplication is not actually performed anywhere by the underlying algorithm; the result is just assumed to be zero. Equivalently, one can say that the part of the computation involving assumed zeros is performed symbolically, not numerically.
trans-unit.target: 主要区别在于，假设的零乘以任何数字或除以任何非零数字时，即使例如乘以 Inf 或除以 NaN ，其总结果也始终为零。出现这种情况的原因是底层算法实际上并未在任何地方执行数值乘法。结果只是假设为零。等效地，可以说涉及假定的零的计算部分是象征性地而不是数字地执行的。

trans-unit.source: The problem is that on entry to the subsasgn method, x is still referenced from the caller’s scope, which means that the method will first need to unshare (copy) x and x.myfield before performing the assignment. Upon completing the call, unless an error occurs, the result is immediately assigned to x in the caller’s scope, so that the previous value of x.myfield is forgotten. Hence, the Octave language implies a copy of N elements (N being the size of x.myfield), where modifying just a single element would actually suffice. In other words, a constant-time operation is degraded to linear-time one. This may be a real problem for user classes that intrinsically store large arrays.
trans-unit.target: 问题在于，在进入 subsasgn 方法时， x 仍从调用者的作用域中引用，这意味着该方法在执行分配之前首先需要取消共享（复制） x 和 x.myfield 。完成呼叫后，除非发生错误，否则结果将立即分配给调用者范围内的 x ，以便忘记 x.myfield 的先前值。因此，八度语言表示N个元素的副本（N是 x.myfield 的大小），实际上只需修改一个元素就足够了。换句话说，恒定时间操作降级为线性时间操作。对于本质上存储大型数组的用户类而言，这可能是一个真正的问题。

trans-unit.source: The recursive algorithm for quadrature presented above is referred to as "iterated". A separate 2-D integration method is implemented in the function quad2d. This function performs a "tiled" integration by subdividing the integration domain into rectangular regions and performing separate integrations over those domains. The domains are further subdivided in areas requiring refinement to reach the desired numerical accuracy. For certain functions this method can be faster than the 2-D iteration used in the other functions above.
trans-unit.target: 上面提出的用于正交的递归算法被称为 "iterated" 。在函数 quad2d 中实现了单独的二维积分方法。此功能通过将积分域细分为矩形区域并在这些域上执行单独的积分来执行 "tiled" 积分。在需要改进以达到所需数值精度的领域中，将域进一步细分。对于某些功能，此方法可能比上述其他功能中使用的2-D迭代更快。

trans-unit.source: The return arguments of eigs depend on the number of return arguments requested. With a single return argument, a vector d of length k is returned containing the k eigenvalues that have been found. With two return arguments, V is a n-by-k matrix whose columns are the k eigenvectors corresponding to the returned eigenvalues. The eigenvalues themselves are returned in d in the form of a n-by-k matrix, where the elements on the diagonal are the eigenvalues.
trans-unit.target: eigs 的返回参数取决于请求的返回参数的数量。使用单个返回参数，将返回长度为 k 的向量 d ，其中包含已找到的 k 个特征值。有两个返回参数， V 是一个 n × k 矩阵，其列是与返回的特征值相对应的 k 个特征向量。特征值本身以 n × k 矩阵的形式在 d 中返回，其中对角线上的元素是特征值。
